Transport of Ho Chi Minh City has just
announced a ban on vehicle traffic on some
roads in District 1 on Sunday,
October 15 to serve the
aerobic exercise program to celebrate Women's Day.
Vietnam October
20 specifically parking vehicles on some
central roads starting from 6:30 to 9:30 on
Sunday October 15, prohibited road sections
include Dong Khoi street, section from
Le Thanh Ton street to Dong Khoi street.  Nguyen Thiep,
Lam Son construction site, both sides of the
city theater, from Hai Ba Trung street
to Dong Khoi street, Le Loi street, from
Nguyen Hue street to Dong Khoi street, the Department of
Transport also announced the
program's alternative circulation route.
Aerobic exercise performance to celebrate Vietnamese Women's Day
will take place in the area in front of the
city theater.
This morning, more than 5 people wearing
Ao Dai costumes marched on the banks of the
Hau River in Can Tho city within the framework of the ceremony.
This is the first time

with the largest number of participants
ever. The participants appeared

scarf was carried back to the main courtyard for the

art program took place to introduce the beauty and
honor the cultural heritage value of the two traditional Ao Dai.

artificial intelligence system ai  working with
rescue workers to improve
safety measures and prevent mountain and water accidents,
this groundbreaking system called swim e was installed by a Swiss company in
May sim uses underwater cameras and  an
AI system adapted to detect
and prevent water intrusion incidents after 300
successful tests. The system has been
used every day since September through a system of
underwater cameras whose images are
focused on a  control room where ai
closely monitors all human movements
when the System recognizes any
unnatural movement it
alerts the rescue personnel and records the
entire incident the rescue personnel then
can check on the screen the
exact location of the victim, assess the
situation and begin the rescue sim Who is
our underwater eye and we
are the above water eye Although the camera
records continuously, but  it only saves the
video in case of an alarm
thereby solving the problem of data security. The
application of this system shows the
potential of adding
safety measures to prevent accidents in the
environment.
An albino puma was
born at the Thomas Bell Zoo in
Ganpati. This rare animal is said to be the
first albino puma in the country to
be born in a
cougar cage.  Normally,
when born, the fetus is pale or
reddish in color with dark spots. The genetic mutation causing
white pigmentation is very rare in this species.
There are almost no similar cases
recorded in the world.  more than 30
days old it is healthy with good physical condition
this animal is an albino individual because the
fur is completely white and does not have
any other color in the early days The
albino lion needs a lot of care and is
susceptible to  sun damage The
zoo keeper team avoided contact with the
albino puma as it was growing
up with its mother in a
den built in a fenced area where its father
was kept in a cage
Because male pumas have a habit of killing their
young, visitors have not yet been able to
admire the beauty of the puma, which is the
second largest cat species in the Americas
after the jaguar and the fourth largest in the world after the jaguar.

2015 Nepal suffered a
7.8 earthquake that killed thousands of people and
turned many hundreds of years old monuments
into ruins, but the
huge restoration work here has helped
stimulate the recovery.  revival of
traditional craft skills that had been dying for
a
long time. Th din tamang is one of
hundreds of craftsmen who have learned a
new profession. He has the opportunity to work on
reconstruction projects.  Rebuilding temples
and houses damaged by natural disasters that year also
destroyed hundreds of monuments and
royal palaces, including
Unesco world heritage sites
in the Cat Mandu Valley.
Rebuilding spurred the need for workers
skilled in traditional architectural techniques,
such as stone carving or intricate wood and metal working,
these crafts were passed down through generations of the
nwa ethnic group, but many  chose
other professions causing them to gradually decline. The
Nepal government has poured more than 45 billion US dollars to
restore heritage sites with many additional projects
funded by a number of countries to help the
above professions become more sustainable.
Nepalese profession said it has trained
hundreds of people in traditional skills
since the earthquake. Up to now, about 80
% of the 920 heritage structures that were
flattened or damaged have been rebuilt.

This is one of the

Huy, a resident of Thu Duc city, and Nguyen
Trung Quoc Thang, a resident of Binh Thanh district, for the
act of throwing dirt on
someone else's house. Previously, Huy had lent him 2.7

pretending to be customers and then
swapping the phone.  photo of a man taking a
real phone at a phone store in District 10,
Ho Chi Minh City. The trick that took place
in just 20 seconds of a
man was recorded by a security camera
according to Mr. Nguyen Van Dau, the store owner.  The
incident happened on October 12 when
a man wearing a mask and carrying
a bag came to ask to buy a
black iPhone 14 pro max 128 GB. When the staff
brought out the phone, the subject asked for
advice on accessories.  While the employee was
getting accessories, the subject quickly
took a box and put it in a cloth bag
on the table to exchange it to get the
phone. After that, this person answered the
phone and left the scene until it was
checked carefully.  Only then did the store discover that
this was a model phone worth about
200,000 VND. The victim reported to the
Police about 300. This morning, a fire
suddenly broke out and destroyed two fishing boats of the
same fisherman anchored on the river.
Tra Bong, Binh Son district, Quang Ngai province
According to initial information, at about 3:00
this morning at the boat anchorage area on
Tra Bong river, a fire broke out on ship
qng 97206 TS, then the fire spread to ship
qng 9099, killing 7 people.  Local people
shouted together to find ways to fight the fire as
well as telegraphed the functional forces of the
fire prevention and fighting police department of
Quang Ngai province, which mobilized officers, soldiers
and vehicles to coordinate with the
local people.  The crew involved in fighting the fire
did not let the engine oil flow out and spread the fire
to dozens of fishing vessels
anchored around about two hours later. The fire was
completely extinguished. One ship
caught fire and sank half of the other ship.
about 30 minutes the cause and
damage of the fire are being investigated to
